Comments_List: This course emphasized (art) historical relationships between Italy and Byzantium in the Late Middle Ages. Each week, a specific topic was considered via a well-curated selection of readings. Professor Nelson was also able to provide a 'crash-course' of several major sites relevant to the course's concerns.
Absolutely! The course covered a wide range of material, but seminar discussions and Professor Nelson's expertise allowed connections between concepts to develop in interesting and exciting ways.
